articles.description: Running Up That Hill's reign at the top of the charts is ended by LF System's Afraid To Feel.
articles.content:
By Mark SavageBBC Music Correspondent
Scottish dance act LF System have topped the UK singles chart, replacing Kate Bush's Running Up That Hill after three weeks.

articles.content:
